title: The Last Leaf to Fall
description: Analee doesnt want to leave her home on the maple tree. She cannot hold on forever, though, and must face the inevitable change that comes when she is The Last Leaf to Fall. A story for all ages and brilliantly illustrated by Donna Maske, children and adults can learn together that change is a natural part of life and not something to fear. This is an eLIVE book, meaning each printed copy contains a special code redeemable for the free download of the audio version of the book.
author: Amy Tippit-Young
